title: Add “Luxury Bazar” branding text and document title

requirements.summary: Show the site name “Luxury Bazar” next to the logo in the persistent header on all pages while keeping the branding as a single home link.
acceptanceCriteria: Header shows the text "Luxury Bazar" next to the logo on both desktop and mobile widths.
The header branding remains a single link to the home route ("/").
No navigation links are removed or renamed as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Update the header brand area to render the text “Luxury Bazar” next to the existing logo image within the same Link to "/". Ensure the layout remains responsive for both desktop and mobile widths, and keep all existing navigation links unchanged.

requirements.summary: Set the HTML document title to “Luxury Bazar”.
acceptanceCriteria: After reload, the browser tab title displays "Luxury Bazar".

file_operations.description: Replace the existing <title> text with exactly "Luxury Bazar" so the browser tab reflects the correct site name after reload.

requirements.summary: Include the site name “Luxury Bazar” in the footer copyright line while keeping existing footer links unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays: "© {currentYear} Luxury Bazar. All rights reserved." (with the current year).
Other existing footer links and the caffeine.ai referral link remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update the copyright paragraph to render "© {currentYear} Luxury Bazar. All rights reserved." using the existing currentYear value, and ensure all other footer links (including the caffeine.ai referral link) remain unchanged.
